main event: A round object resembling a tire or hubcap with red and yellow rotating lights was sighted in Aripeka, Florida on 12 February 1956.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 10 minutes,The object was seen through binoculars,There was a B-47 and a KC-97 in the area at the time of the sighting but they were not refueling,The object seemed to land or went beyond the horizon,The report concluded that the sighted object could possibly be an aircraft.
sighted object: one round object with red and yellow rotating lights
